title: GDCR@LMIS | Osnabrück
description: Welcome to the Global Day of Coderetreat event hosted by LMIS AG in the beautiful city of Osnabrück! Join us for a day of intensive coding, learning, and collaboration with fellow programmers and software enthusiasts from all over the world. This event is part of the global Coderetreat movement, which encourages software developers to hone their skills through focused practice and teamwork.
